definition: an ornamental border consisting of short lengths of hanging threads or tassels, decorate with or as if with a surrounding fringe
details:
noun
- an ornamental border consisting of short lengths of hanging threads or tassels
- a border of hair that is cut short and hangs across the forehead
= synonyms: bang
- a social group holding marginal or extreme views
= example: a social group holding marginal or extreme views
- a part of the city far removed from the center
= synonyms: outskirt
- one of the light or dark bands produced by the interference and diffraction of light
= synonyms: interference fringe
- the outside boundary or surface of something
= synonyms: periphery, outer boundary
verb
- decorate with or as if with a surrounding fringe
= example: decorate with or as if with a surrounding fringe
- adorn with a fringe
= example: adorn with a fringe
